condition.title: Problem
condition.p: I encounter scaling detection issues in a high resolution display (for example, some GUI components are too small).

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: This sometimes happens when using multiple displays with different resolutions because the application cannot detect the correct scaling setting.

steps-informal.p: You can use the sun.java2d.uiScale Java system property to instruct Java to use a particular scaling factor:-Dsun.java2d.uiScale=1.5
